pr_title: OKAPI-911: Unit test failures for ProcessModuleHandleTest

timeline.message: No need to wait for cmdineStop
Shut down that NetClient for each tryConnect attempt

testExecMultiple: spawn 3 rather than 9 modules

Spawning 9 takes a long time on slower systems which gives
test errors (when in reality waiting longer would make it succeed).
Increase wait for install/deployment in InstallTest

timeline.bodyText: Can you also remove the import of TimeUnit?
timeline.author: julianladisch
julianladisch
julianladisch

timeline.message:
Wait 3 seconds for process stop/start wo port

WHen there is a port, it is still 1 second, at which point
the exit code is checked if the process has shut down. If not,
when a port is in use the system will wait for listener to
be present or be gone.
